message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take the lion's share, but you'll get a good chunk as well. We can work out a better deal in the future if you're willing to cooperate.
You took the lion's share last time, now it's my turn. Let's see if you'll accept a fairer deal this time.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm not comfortable taking such a small share. Let's find a middle ground where we both get a decent amount. I'm willing to compromise.
I'm not budging on the 50/50 split. It's the only way I'll get a fair deal in this game.
